Universal Mind.quote: "The divine mind is the universal intelligence that pervades all creation." (Plotinus, Enneads)

Cosmic Intelligence.quote: "That which is the finest essence â€“ this whole world has that as its soul. That is Reality. That is Truth. That art thou." (Chandogya Upanishad 6.8.7)

Divine Intelligence.quote: "The Logos was with God, and the Logos was God." (John 1:1)

Supreme Consciousness.quote: "Pure consciousness is the supreme reality that underlies all existence." (Shankara, Vivekachudamani)

Infinite Wisdom.quote: "O the depth of the riches both of the wisdom and knowledge of God!" (Romans 11:33)

Divine Knowledge.quote: "Knowledge is the wing wherewith we fly to heaven." (Shakespeare, Henry VI)

Cosmic Consciousness.quote: "The universe is not only queerer than we suppose, but queerer than we can suppose." (J.B.S. Haldane)

Divine Thought.quote: "In the beginning was thought, and the thought was with God." (Meister Eckhart)

Universal Intelligence.quote: "Intelligence is the source of all becoming." (Sri Aurobindo, The Life Divine)

Divine Understanding.quote: "Understanding is the reward of faith." (Augustine of Hippo)

Cosmic Mind.quote: "The cosmic mind contains all possibilities." (Carl Jung, Collected Works)

Divine Reason.quote: "Divine reason is the sovereign of the universe." (Marcus Aurelius, Meditations)

Supreme Intellect.quote: "The supreme intellect is the source of all knowledge." (Al-Farabi)

Divine Insight.quote: "The eye with which I see God is the same eye with which God sees me." (Meister Eckhart)

Cosmic Order.quote: "The Tao is the way of Heaven and Earth." (Tao Te Ching)

Universal Law.quote: "The divine law moves through all things." (Heraclitus)

Divine Cognition.quote: "In divine cognition, knower and known are one." (Nicholas of Cusa)

Cosmic Intellect.quote: "The cosmic intellect is the source of all forms." (Ibn Sina)

Divine Light.quote: "God is light, and in him is no darkness at all." (1 John 1:5)

Universal Wisdom.quote: "Wisdom reaches from end to end mightily." (Wisdom 8:1)

Divine Science.quote: "The divine science is the knowledge of unity in multiplicity." (Leibniz)

Cosmic Understanding.quote: "To understand all is to forgive all." (Buddha)

Divine Consciousness.quote: "Consciousness is the fundamental thing in existence." (Sri Aurobindo)

Universal Truth.quote: "Truth is universal but our expressions of it are relative." (Swami Vivekananda)

Divine Perception.quote: "In pure perception, the seer and seen become one." (Patanjali, Yoga Sutras)
